name: Spaceship Game (Sandwich_Boi, Selin D)
description:
Spaceship Game

A spaceship game about collecting wings and using them against enemies. Collecting these wings will give you a chance to fight back, but make it harder for you to avoid threats.

This was a semester project that was done with selindoga, so there are a lot of questionable and broken stuff in the game. (like the super unnecessary quit button) So yeah, sorry about those. (again...)

Please don't use fullscreen, it will probably just break the game.

Controls:

  • wasd - moving around
  • left shift - dashing

Credits:

  • Selin Doğa Orhan
  • Berkay Sarıtaş
Background image was designed by tartila from Freepik
